greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: n-th derivative of (x^x)^x at x=1.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..400
maple: a:= n-> n!*coeff(series(subs(x=x+1, (x^x)^x ), x, n+1), x, n):
mathematica: m = 24; CoefficientList[((x+1)^(x+1))^(x+1) + O[x]^(m+1), x]*Range[0, m]! (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 07 2021 *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 14 2012
